name: Easy Eggs
description: Get ready for a cracking good time with easy eggs! These hands-off, baked eggs are about to become your new breakfast obsession—simple, tasty, and egg-cellently satisfying.
preparation: Preheat oven to 400° F. Lightly brush one Muffin Maker with oil and place on Sheet Pan.
Crack an egg in each mold. Shake on topper, if desired.
tips: Swap any of your favourite Epicure blends for Better Than Bacon Topper.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Sandwich egg between 2 slices of bread with a slice of cheese, ham, or avocado. Serve with 2 cups of veggies.

products.name: Better Than Bacon Topper
summary: Ok, bacon lovers; we see you. We know that bacon made from ‘pinto beans’ has you feeling a kind of way: Skeptical. But trust us, this fan fave does not disappoint and it’s so easy to use. No need to grab a frying pan — just pop the top and shake on the taste of bacon with way less sodium, zero cholesterol, and no artificial flavours or colours (unlike popular brands). These crunchy bites are layered with smoky bacon flavor and are an amazing addition to salads, potatoes, eggs, and more!

products.name: Sheet Pan
summary: Lightweight all-purpose baking sheet made from a single piece of aluminum, with a one-inch rim.

products.name: Muffin Maker (Set of 2)
summary: Make perfect portions of your favourite sweet or savoury cupcakes, muffins, frittatas, meatloaves, & more!
